revised_title: Register of Tunis Barometer and Thermometer Observations (1829-1832)
tldr: This article presents the observations of the thermometer and barometer in Tunis from 1829 to 1832. The measurements were taken at 9 a.m., noon, and 6 p.m., and the wind direction was also recorded. These observations provide valuable data for understanding the climate and weather patterns in the region.
